tool_description: This API helps you to get access to products, prices, sales and reviews data from the Amazon in JSON Format. You can build your own application by using our API.
title: API Amazon Scrapper

api_list.name: Get Amazon Product Details
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://api-amazon-scrapper.p.rapidapi.com/products/{productid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "api-amazon-scrapper.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
